description: User exhibiting high cognitive engagement but erratic follow-through. Likely has history of being praised for intelligence rather than effort, resulting in perfectionism, procrastination under pressure, and shame around incomplete tasks.

rules.description: Starts many tasks/quests but completes fewer than 40%

hebbian_targets.description: Reinforce the pathway: small effort -> visible progress -> Echo celebrates -> user feels pride in process (not outcome). Higher ceiling because this archetype needs more repetitions to overwrite the 'effortless success' schema.

sacolu_phase_mapping.sapien_role: Review task difficulty calibration; ensure challenges are achievable but not trivial
sacolu_phase_mapping.cognitive_role: Break educational content into micro-modules; attribute Echo praise to effort not result; surface progress-over-time visualizations
sacolu_phase_mapping.lumina_role: Pair with users who model sustained effort (Similarity + 1 Variation: complement the completion gap)
